characterDescription:
Abrobadar is a full Alethi Shardbearer in Aladar's warcamp on the Shattered Plains.
Abrobadar participated in the duel between Adolin/Renarin/Kaladin and Relis/Elit/Jakamav, which was (by fault of the dueling agreement) inclusive of more opposing Shardbearers than Adolin had anticipated.
